name: Blimp Tower Defence
description:
Current Features

  • 7 levels
  • 9 blimp types
  • Upgrades for every tower
  • Shop
  • Buy extra lives with cash earned by completing levels
  • New unlock system

Future Plans

-Shop

  • Spend money to continue in levels and upgrade turret stats
  • Spend money to unlock cool starting perks

-Levels

  • 4 new snowy levels
  • 5 desert levels
  • 5 ocean levels
  • And much more

I recommend getting the itch app because of the frequent updates.  

If you have any ideas or found bugs or issues in the game feel free to let me know in the comments.

Thank you!
